resources.string: One Byte: Use this method to overwrite a file only once with random secure bytes. It is fast but less secure.
German VSITR: German Federal Office for IT Security uses this method. Employ this method to overwrtie a file with secure bytes 7 times and an additional random byte pass. Secure but slower

Peter Gutman: 35 Pass Algorithm. File will undergo 4 random,27 pattern and finally, 4 additional random passes. Securest of them all but also the slowest. Do not use this unless very very cautious about the data. it will take a lot of time to finish.
Bruce Schneier: File will undergo 2 pattern and 5 additional random passes.
Standard US DoD: Standard US department of defense 520.22-M (E) algorithm. Secure erase the file by overwriting it by 3 random passes. US DoD erases their digital data using this algorithm

Extended US DoD: Extended US department of defense 520.22-M (ECE) algorithm. Secure erase the file by overwriting it by 3 random passes and 4 pattern passes. US DoD erases their digital data using this algorithm
